document.full_text: stocks fell for a fourth day on thursday as a massive sell-off in commodities spilled into other markets, forcing investors out of riskier assets and rattling the equities market before friday's payrolls data.
document.title: commodities rout forces wall st retreat
lines_and_colors: stocks fell for a fourth day on thursday as a massive sell-off in commodities spilled into other markets, forcing investors out of riskier assets and rattling the equities market before friday's payrolls data.
